title: Amazing Materials
abstractText:
We seek funding to update our interactive exhibit, themed Amazing Materials, which demonstrates several types of materials with unusual properties and behaviour, including superconductors, negative thermal expansion materials, auxetic materials, liquid crystals, thermochromic materials, ferrofluids and fuel cell materials. The activity involves poster displays, hands-on exhibits and demonstrations and discussions with active young researchers.

The project will take place at Durham Science Festival held at Durham University Science Site in the week of 24 March 2008. The target audience are Year 9 and Year 10 science students from secondary schools in the North East. The expected attandance is about 500 pupils.
